existing_features.title: In `frontend/src/components/landing/ContactSection.tsx`, remove the location card heading text "Start Your Adventure" and remove any "Location?" text if present, but keep the Scotland flag emoji visible in that heading area.

In `frontend/src/components/landing/Footer.tsx`, remove the existing bottom attribution that links to caffeine.ai ("Built with ... using caffeine.ai") and replace it with exactly: "built by Dave and thats why the website is so shit".

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove the heading "start your adventure" and the "Location?" text while keeping the Scotland flag emoji
Add a CAPTCHA to the contact form to reduce spam submissions
Replace the site footer text "built by caffeine AI" with the user-provided custom attribution text

projectName: Update location card heading text and replace footer attribution
